name: buildinginfo
description: Looks up information about an MIT building.

options.name: query
options.description: Query (e.g., building name or number) to search in the building directory.

name: courseinfo
description: Looks up a course in the MIT course catalog by subject ID.

options.name: id
options.description: Subject ID (e.g., "6.100A") to look up.

name: dining
description: Retrieves up-to-date information about dining options at MIT.

options.name: menus
options.description: Shows menus for MIT dining venues.

options.name: venue
options.description: The venue for which menus should be retrieved.

options.name: meal
options.description: The meal for which the menu should be retrieved.

name: idcard
description: Displays the actual identity corresponding to your linked Kerberos.

options.name: withpicture
options.description: Show your MIT ID card photo. Defaults to true.

options.name: preview
options.description: Display the card only for yourself, without showing others in the channel. Defaults to false.

name: localtime
description: Gets the local time at MIT (default) or in another specified time zone.

options.name: timezone
options.description: The time zone to use, in UTC offset or IANA format. Defaults to MIT's time zone.

name: ping
description: Checks whether IdentiBot is online and measures latency.

name: resetnick
description: Resets the user's nickname using the cached profile information from the linked Kerberos account.

options.name: user
options.description: User whose nickname is to be reset.

name: searchdir
description: Performs a search in the public MIT directory.

options.name: query
options.description: Query to search in the MIT directory (e.g., name, email address, etc.).

name: seeidphoto
description: Retrieves a user's MIT ID card photo (if you have permission to do so).

options.name: user
options.description: User whose ID card photo should be retrieved.

name: sipbdoor
description: Determines whether the SIPB office is open or closed.

options.name: allowmemberidphotolookup
options.description: Allow all verified server members (except blocked users) to look up your MIT ID photo.

options.name: value
options.description: The desired value for this setting. Leave blank to see the current value.

options.name: allowmoderatoridphotolookup
options.description: Allow verified server moderators to look up your MIT ID photo.

options.name: value
options.description: The desired value for this setting. Leave blank to see the current value.

options.name: blockserver
options.description: Block all users from interacting with you via IdentiBot commands in this server.

options.name: blockuser
options.description: Block a user from interacting with you via IdentiBot commands.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to block.

options.name: unblockserver
options.description: Allow users to interact with you via IdentiBot commands in a previously blocked server.

options.name: unblockuser
options.description: Allow a previously blocked user to interact with you via IdentiBot commands.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to unblock.

name: whois
description: Retrieves the cached profile information from a user's linked Kerberos account.

options.name: user
options.description: User whose Kerberos profile is to be retrieved.

options.name: onlyme
options.description: Whether you are the only person who can see the response to this query. Defaults to false.
